add-translation.sendAnnouncementDescription: Send a message with the announcement description, you have 14 minutes to do so.
add-translation.descriptionMaxLength: ❌ The description must be less than 4096 characters.
add-translation.footerMaxLength: ❌ The footer must be less than 2048 characters.
add-translation.titleMaxLength: ❌ The title must be less than 256 characters.
add-translation.urlNotValid: ❌ The provided URL is not valid.
add-translation.done: ✅ The announcement translation has been added.

add.notValidColor:
❌ Invalid color format, try one of the following {{validColors}}.
You can use an online color picker or use one of the following valid names:
https://i.imgur.com/mGKeXCT.png
add.notValidImage: ❌ Invalid image url, make sure it ends with a image extension (.png, .jpg, etc)..

help.description:
Hi 👋, I'm **{{username}}**, a bot that allows you to post announcements in multiple languages on your server.

__**Main commands**__
• Use {{add_command}} to add an announcement.
• Use {{add_translation_command}} to add a translation to an announcement.
• Use {{publish_command}} to publish the announcement.

list.notAnnouncements: ❌ This server doesn't have announcements, create one with `/announcements add`.

publish.errorPerms: ❌ You don't have permissions to send messages in that channel.
publish.cannotSend: ❌ I can't send messages in that channel.

edit.defaultError: ❌ An error has occurred while trying to edit the announcement, please try again.
